Summary: A HUGE circle near the moon that stayed still for awhile.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Clovis
There were no other sightings in Clovis on or around November 9th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home from the store and near the moon there was a huge circle. I couldn't get a clear picture. I was holding my cat while looking at it again later and my cat started to freak out!
